Hero.body: Captured on the streets of Oaxaca, these photos celebrate life, honor the departed, and showcase one of Mexico‚Äôs most vibrant cultural traditions.

Sections.localsDescription: Every face tells a story. In the heart of Oaxaca, locals transform themselves into living art ‚Äî painted skulls, elegant Catrinas, and costumed spirits who blur the line between life and death. These portraits capture the soul of the celebration: pride, remembrance, and joy interwoven in every expression. Behind each mask is a heartbeat, honoring those who came before with color, laughter, and unshakable spirit.
